Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will meet your needs perfectly. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer
